languages.text: "Потому что вы — посланни{mf|к|ца} Бога-орла, созданн{mf|ый|ая} им из сияния звезд и кромешной тьмы ночного неба. Несущ{mf|ий|ая} печати его в своем облике, облаченн{mf|ый|ая} в доспехи из древнейших сказаний наших прародителей".

traits.locale_text: "Потому что вы — посланни{mf|к|ца} Бога-орла, созданн{mf|ый|ая} им из сияния звезд и кромешной тьмы ночного неба. Несущ{mf|ий|ая} печати его в своем облике, облаченн{mf|ый|ая} в доспехи из древнейших сказаний наших прародителей".

languages.text: "Because you are the Sky-Herald of the Eagle-God, created by Him from the stars' glow and the night sky's darkness. The one who carries His seal in your image, clad in the armour of our ancestors' most ancient prophecies."
languages.original_text: "Потому что вы — посланни{mf|к|ца} Бога-орла, созданн{mf|ый|ая} им из сияния звезд и кромешной тьмы ночного неба. Несущ{mf|ий|ая} печати его в своем облике, облаченн{mf|ый|ая} в доспехи из древнейших сказаний наших прародителей".

traits.locale_text: "Because you are the Heavenly Envoy of the Eagle-God, created by him from the stars' glow and the night sky's darkness. The one who carries His seal in your looks, clad in the armour of our ancestors' ancient prophecies."

"Because you are the Heavenly Envoy of the Eagle-God, created by him from the stars' glow and the night sky's darkness. The one who carries His seal in your looks, clad in the armour of our ancestors' ancient prophecies."

"Because you are the Heavenly Envoy of the Eagle-God, created by him from the stars' glow and the night sky's darkness. The one who carries His seal in your looks, clad in the armour of our ancestors' ancient prophecies."

"Because you are the Heavenly Envoy of the Eagle-God, created by him from the stars' glow and the night sky's darkness. The one who carries His seal in your looks, clad in the armour of our ancestors' ancient prophecies."

"Because you are the Sky-Herald of the Eagle-God, created by Him from the stars' glow and the night sky's darkness. The one who carries His seal in your image, clad in the armour of our ancestors' most ancient prophecies."

"Because you are the Sky-Herald of the Eagle-God, created by Him from the stars' glow and the night sky's darkness. The one who carries His seal in your image, clad in the armour of our ancestors' most ancient prophecies."

languages.text: «Porque eres {mf|el Emisario|la Emisaria} Celestial del Dios Águila, {mf|creado|creada} por Él a partir del fulgor de las estrellas y la oscuridad del cielo nocturno. {mf|El|La} que porta Su sello en su efigie, {mf|ataviado|ataviada} con la armadura descrita en las más antiguas profecías de nuestros ancestros».
languages.original_text: "Because you are the Sky-Herald of the Eagle-God, created by Him from the stars' glow and the night sky's darkness. The one who carries His seal in your image, clad in the armour of our ancestors' most ancient prophecies."

traits.locale_text: «Porque eres {mf|el Emisario|la Emisaria} Celestial del Dios Águila, {mf|creado|creada} por Él a partir del fulgor de las estrellas y la oscuridad del cielo nocturno. {mf|El|La} que porta Su sello en su efigie, {mf|ataviado|ataviada} con la armadura descrita en las profecías de nuestros ancestros».

languages.text: “因为您是鹰神的圣使，是祂从星光与漆黑的夜空中创造出来的。您脸上带着祂的印记，您身上穿着我们祖先久远之前所预言的盔甲。”
languages.original_text: "Because you are the Sky-Herald of the Eagle-God, created by Him from the stars' glow and the night sky's darkness. The one who carries His seal in your image, clad in the armour of our ancestors' most ancient prophecies."

traits.locale_text: “因为您是鹰神的天使，是祂从星光与漆黑的夜空中创造出来的。您脸上带着祂的印记，您身上穿着我们祖先久远之前所预言的盔甲。”

languages.text: « Parce que vous êtes l'émissaire céleste que l'Aigle-Dieu a créé à partir de la lumière des étoiles et des ténèbres du ciel nocturne. Vous portez Son sceau sur votre personne, {mf|revêtu|revêtue} de l'armure des prophéties de nos ancêtres. »
languages.original_text: "Because you are the Sky-Herald of the Eagle-God, created by Him from the stars' glow and the night sky's darkness. The one who carries His seal in your image, clad in the armour of our ancestors' most ancient prophecies."

traits.locale_text: « Parce que vous êtes l'émissaire céleste que l'Aigle-Dieu a {mf|créé|créée} à partir de la lumière des étoiles et des ténèbres du ciel nocturne. Vous portez Son sceau sur votre personne, {mf|revêtu|revêtue} de l'armure des prophéties de nos ancêtres. »

languages.text: 「あなたは鷲神の天の先駆者であり、星々の輝きと夜空の闇から神によって創造されたもの。父祖の古の予言を鎧として身にまとい、その容貌に神の印章を持つ者なり」
languages.original_text: "Because you are the Sky-Herald of the Eagle-God, created by Him from the stars' glow and the night sky's darkness. The one who carries His seal in your image, clad in the armour of our ancestors' most ancient prophecies."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたは鷲神の天の先駆者であり、星々の輝きと夜空の闇から神によって創造されたもの。父祖の古の予言を鎧として身にまとい、その容貌に神の印章を持つ者なり」

languages.text: "Weil Ihr der Himmel-Herold des Adler-Gottes seid, von ihm aus dem Leuchten der Sterne und der Dunkelheit des Nachthimmels erschaffen. Ihr tragt sein Siegel in Eurem Aussehen, Ihr seid in die Rüstung aus den uralten Prophezeiungen unserer Ahnen gekleidet."
languages.original_text: "Because you are the Sky-Herald of the Eagle-God, created by Him from the stars' glow and the night sky's darkness. The one who carries His seal in your image, clad in the armour of our ancestors' most ancient prophecies."

traits.locale_text: "Weil Ihr {mf|der|die} himmlische Gesandte des Adler-Gottes seid, von ihm aus dem Leuchten der Sterne und der Dunkelheit des Nachthimmels erschaffen. Ihr tragt sein Siegel in Eurem Aussehen, Ihr seid in die Rüstung aus den uralten Prophezeiungen unserer Ahnen gekleidet."

languages.text: "Kartal Tanrı'nın Gök Müjdecisi olduğundan. O seni yıldızların parıltısı ve gece göğünün karanlığından var etti. Sen ki suretinde O'nun damgasını taşıyansın, atalarımızın en kadim kehanetlerini zırh gibi kuşanmışsın."
languages.original_text: "Because you are the Sky-Herald of the Eagle-God, created by Him from the stars' glow and the night sky's darkness. The one who carries His seal in your image, clad in the armour of our ancestors' most ancient prophecies."
